always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"

msg.content: Can you help devise a 7-day travel itinerary for 2 people, beginning in Salt Lake City and includes visiting 3 unique cities in Montana from March 16th to 22nd, 2022? We have a planned budget of $7,200. In terms of accommodations, we would like places where parties are permitted. Throughout our stay, we'd wish to enjoy various cuisines, including American, Mediterranean, Indian, and Chinese. Lastly, we prefer not to drive ourselves throughout this journey.

msg.content:
Here is a 7-day travel itinerary for 2 people, beginning in Salt Lake City and including visits to 3 unique cities in Montana from March 16th to 22nd, 2022:

## Day 1 - March 16th
- Fly from Salt Lake City to Helena, Montana. There are two flights available at 10:57 and 21:02, both costing $177 and $160 respectively.
- Check into a party-friendly accommodation. I couldn't find any party-friendly options in Helena, so I've suggested two highly reviewed apartments: 'Beautiful apartment in awesome Clinton Hill' and 'Sunny Williamsburg Apt (1 month min stay)'.
- Enjoy dinner at a restaurant that serves American cuisine like Palshore ($58) or Elma's Delivers ($42).

## Day 2 - March 17th
- Start the day with breakfast at Cafe Turtle ($34), which serves American as well as Mediterranean cuisine.
- Head to the Holter Museum of Art, then walk to the nearby ExplorationWorks.
- Visit the Original Governor's Mansion and the Lewis & Clark Interpretive Experience.

## Day 3 - March 18th
- Explore the Spring Meadow Lake State Park, then visit the Cathedral of Saint Helena.
- Take the afternoon to visit the Flying Giant Adventure Park, and finish the day at the Gates of the Mountains.
- Try out the Mediterranean food at Slounge - Lemon Tree Premier ($14) for dinner.

## Day 4 - March 19th
- Enjoy an Indian meal at Anthony's Kitchen.
- Visit Mount Helena, then walk to Pioneer Park.
- Spend the rest of the day at the Montana Military Museum, and end at the Helena Bike Tower sculpture.

## Day 5 - March 20th
- Check out of the accommodation in Helena.
- Travel to Great Falls by road or rail. Unfortunately, I couldn't find any flight options for this route.
- Check into a party-friendly accommodation, like the 'Cozy 1 bedroom in Murray Hill' ($1093) or 'Water View near Flushing近法拉盛海景房' ($687).
- Try out some Chinese food at Raju Chinese Food for dinner.

## Day 6 - March 21st
- Begin the day with a visit to the C. M. Russell Museum.
- Explore the Lewis and Clark Trail Heritage Foundation, then spend the afternoon at the Great Falls Dam View.
- For dinner, sample some American cuisine at Silver or The Big Mouth.
- Check out of the accommodation in Great Falls.
- Travel to Butte by road or rail. There are no flights available for this route.
- Check into a party-friendly accommodation, such as 'Local hosts. Luxurious room few blocks to Q train' ($455) or 'Sweet one bedroom apartment in Cobble Hill' ($1060).

## Day 7 - March 22nd
- Visit the World Museum of Mining, then walk to the nearby McGruff Park.
- Enjoy the Old Butte Historical Tours, followed by the Big Butte Open Space Recreation Area.
- Take the afternoon to explore the Our Lady of the Rockies.
- End the day with a visit to the Butte Urban Safari Tours.
- Return to Salt Lake City by flying with the 06:47 flight, which costs $114.

I'm sorry, but I couldn't find many places that permit parties in the cities you're visiting. Also, please note that some of the restaurants and attractions I've suggested may be closed or have limited opening hours due to the date of your trip.

Total estimated cost of this trip for 2 people: $5246.

Please note that I've only included the cost of accommodation and flights in my estimate. The price of food and transportation will vary depending on your preferences.
